title: How much will SEO cost in 2021? - Quora

response.answer_text: As per current circumstances of businesses due to COVID more small and medium sized businesses are coming online which is creating more competition in SEO and other digital marketing aspects. Earlier you could get SEO for 10 keywords in 150$ for locally based targeted audience but now the prices have gone up to minimum 200$ and I'm expecting the same will go up to minimum 230–250$ monthly for upto 10 keywords. So this is how it is going to be. Regards AG
It is not possible to say exactly how much because it depends on many factors But approximately 10000 -20000/Month
